What specific project were you referring to?

articles.description:
Re 7 月 21 日 Terra 及 Do Kwon 案件中，法官表示将以 Ripple 案作为本案的相关判例，除非 SEC 对其提出上诉。而 SEC 律师则对援引这一判例表示了反对。https://twitter.com/JohnEDeaton1/status/1682863291947974659

John E Deaton: An appeal is not even close to be a setback. First, it will be two years from now before a decision is issued by the 2nd Circuit, if it’s appealed. The Torres Decision is the law until then - at least in the 2nd Circuit. Second, even if the 2nd Circuit said Torres was wrong… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1682863291947974659

More info:
articles.title: Re 周一将举行 space 活动，更清楚地解释事件的情况。https://twitter.com/ParaSpace_NFT/status/1682957087196975104

articles.author: 吴说区块链
articles.description: 吴说获悉，NFT 借贷协议 ParaSpace 发推表示，在 7 月 3 日至 7 月 4 日期间，少数用户的资产以低于地板价的价格清算，已联系受影响用户并补偿差价。发生这种情况是由于荷兰式拍卖在后端运行，而没有显示资产在前端被拍卖。当清算被触发时，成功购买NFT将终止拍卖。

ZachXBT: Earlier today Alphapo hot wallets were drained for $23M+ on ETH, TRON, BTC.
HypeDrop (Alphapo customer) has since had withdrawals disabled. 
On Ethereum the stolen funds were swapped for ETH then bridged to Avalanche and Bitcoin. https://t.co/pj7i3ZlBrX

Elon Musk: To address extreme levels of data scraping & system manipulation, we’ve applied the following temporary limits:
- Verified accounts are limited to reading 6000 posts/day
- Unverified accounts to 600 posts/day
- New unverified accounts to 300/day
